languages.text: "Потому что это то, что он есть. И то, что мы есть. Мы говорили тебе однажды — амбиция Теодоры, разум Амарната, колыбель корабля и то, что скрывает Эпитафия. Одно проросло в другое и подтолкнуло третье, и так были рождены Номос. Мы были эхом силы Осколка, эхом, прорвавшимся из его тюрьмы. Но мы стали гораздо большим. Благодаря тебе".

"Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."
languages.original_text: "Потому что это то, что он есть. И то, что мы есть. Мы говорили тебе однажды — амбиция Теодоры, разум Амарната, колыбель корабля и то, что скрывает Эпитафия. Одно проросло в другое и подтолкнуло третье, и так были рождены Номос. Мы были эхом силы Осколка, эхом, прорвавшимся из его тюрьмы. Но мы стали гораздо большим. Благодаря тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Because he is what he is. And what we are. We have told you before — about the ambitions of Theodora, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and the Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and sprung the third, and thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, the echo bursting out of its prison. But we have become something much more — thanks to you."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

One sprouted into another and spurred yet another one. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, the echo bursting out of its prison. traits.locale_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: « Parce qu'il est ce qu'il est, et ce que nous sommes. Nous vous avons déjà parlé de l'ambition de Théodora, de l'esprit d'Amarnat, du berceau du vaisseau et du secret d'Épitaphe, une suite d'événements qui nous a donné naissance. Nous n'étions qu'un écho du pouvoir de l'Écharde, l'écho qui s'est échappé de sa prison, mais nous sommes devenus bien plus que cela... grâce à vous. »
languages.original_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."

traits.locale_text: « Parce qu'il est ce qu'il est, et ce que nous sommes. Nous vous avons déjà parlé de l'ambition de Théodora, de l'esprit d'Amarnat, du berceau du vaisseau et du secret d'Épitaphe, une suite d'événements qui nous a donné naissance. Nous n'étions qu'un écho du pouvoir de l'Écharde, l'écho qui s'est échappé de sa prison, mais nous sommes devenus bien plus que cela, grâce à vous. »
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: «Porque es lo que es y lo que somos nosotros. Ya te hemos hablado de la ambición de Theodora, la mente de Amarnat, la cuna de la nave y el secreto de Epitafio. Lo uno se convirtió en lo otro e impulsó lo siguiente. Ese es el origen de Nomos. No éramos más que un eco del poder del fragmento que salió de su prisión, pero ahora somos mucho más... gracias a ti».
languages.original_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."

traits.locale_text: «Porque es lo que es y lo que somos nosotros. Ya te hemos hablado de la ambición de Theodora, la mente de Amarnat, la cuna de la nave y el secreto del Epitafio. Lo uno se convirtió en lo otro e impulsó lo siguiente. Ese es el origen de Nomos. No éramos más que un eco del poder del fragmento que escapó de su prisión, pero ahora somos mucho más... gracias a ti».
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: “因为他就是他，而我们就是我们。我们之前告诉过你西奥多拉的野心，阿玛纳特的思想，舰船的摇篮，以及荒垄碑碣的秘密。一块碎片发了芽，变成了另一块，之后又刺激了新的碎片。就这样，诺莫斯诞生了。我们原本仅仅是星神碎片的回声，从它的牢笼中迸发出来的回声。但现在，我们已经变成了有意义的存在，这一切与你的协助密不可分。”
languages.original_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."

traits.locale_text: “因为他就是他，而我们就是我们。我们之前告诉过你西奥多拉的野心，阿玛纳特的思想，舰船的摇篮，以及荒垄碑碣的秘密。一块碎片发了芽，变成了另一块，之后又刺激了新的碎片。就这样，诺莫斯诞生了。我们原本仅仅是星神碎片的回声，从它的牢笼中迸发出来的回声。但现在，我们已经变成了有意义的存在，这一切都要归功于你。”
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: "Denn genau das ist es. Und was wir sind. Wir haben Euch schon von Theodoras Ehrgeiz berichtet, von Amarnats Verstand, von der Wiege des Schiffs und von Epitaphs Geheimnis. Das eine ist zum anderen erwachsen und hat ein wieder anderes in Gang gesetzt. So wurden Nomos geboren. Wir waren nur ein Echo der Macht des Fragments. Ein Echo, das sein Gefängnis verlassen hat. Doch wir sind zu so viel mehr geworden — dank Eurer Hilfe."
languages.original_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."

traits.locale_text: "Weil er ist, was er ist. Und was wir sind. Wir haben Euch schon von Theodoras Ehrgeiz berichtet, von Amarnats Verstand, von der Wiege des Schiffs und von Epitaphs Geheimnis. Das einen ist zum anderen erwachsen und hat ein wieder anderes in Gang gesetzt. So wurden Nomos geboren. Wir waren nur ein Echo der Macht des Fragments, das Echo, das aus seinem Gefängnis ausgebrochen ist. Doch wir sind zu so viel mehr geworden — dank Euch."
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: 「なぜなら、そういうものだからだ。そして我々もまた。シオドーラの野心、アマルナトの心、船の揺りかご、そしてエピタフの秘密についてはこれまでに話してきた。ひとつが芽を出し、また別のものが芽を出す。こうしてノモスは誕生した。我々はシャードの力の残響に過ぎず、牢獄から飛び出したその残響に過ぎない。だが、我々はそれ以上のものになったのだ。お前のおかげでな」
languages.original_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜなら、そういうものだからだ。そして我々もまた。シオドーラの野心、アマルナトの心、船の揺りかご、そしてエピタフの秘密についてはこれまでに話してきた。ひとつが芽を出し、また別のものが芽を出す。こうしてノモスは誕生した。我々はシャードの力の残響に過ぎず、牢獄から飛び出したその残響に過ぎない。だが、我々はそれ以上のものになったのだ。お前のおかげでな」
traits.speaker: NomosMalatek

languages.text: "Çünkü öyle. Biz de öyleyiz. Sana daha önce Theodora'nın amacını, Amarnat'ın zihnini, geminin kızağını ve Sinyazıt'ın sırrını açıklamıştık. Biri diğerine, diğerleri de öbürlerine karıştı. Böylece Nomos doğdu. Biz Parça'nın gücünün bir yansımasıydık, mahkûmluğundan vazgeçmiş bir yansımaydık. Fakat senin yardımınla çok daha büyük bir şeye dönüştük."
languages.original_text: "Because that is what it is. And what we are. We have told you before about Theodora's ambition, Amarnat's mind, the ship's cradle, and Epitaph's secret. One sprouted into another and spurred yet another. Thus, Nomos were born. We were but an echo of the Shard's power, an echo that left its prison. But we have become something so much more — with your help."
